articles.title: Kiss Kiss, Bye Bye - Defector
articles.description: Morocco reaching the semifinal of the World Cup is glorious enough, but the moment that will resonate most is Jawad El Yamiq's cheeky kiss.
articles.content: The many and manifest sadnesses of this Qatar World Cup, which peaked with the death of the wonderfully gifted Grant Wahl on Friday, are likely to endure well after all reasonable people have grapple… [+4278 chars]
